explains: n. 磁带盒，盒式磁带；胶片盒
wordGroup: cassette tape 盒式录音带，盒式磁带
cassette player 录音带放音机；卡式录音机
video cassette 录影带；盒式录象带
video cassette recorder 磁带录像机（简写VCR）

sentences.en: I swapped him my CD for his cassette.
sentences.cn: 我拿我的激光唱片换了他的盒式磁带。

sentences.en: This recording is available on disc or cassette.
sentences.cn: 这录音有激光唱片和盒式磁带两种。

sentences.en: Cassette recorders cannot rival the sound quality of CDs.
sentences.cn: 盒式磁带录音机在音质上无法与CD相媲美。
